attributes.action: rob and then exile fred the shred.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Yeah, well, I know exile is an ancient punishment but it sounds good :-)

I'm sure everyone is feeling the same way about someone who got a £16MILLION pension for screwing up. Oh and we might exile the goverment officials for giving the go ahead for this.  We'll do that in another petition.

Yours Truly,
Net Pirate.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
